column4: I've an installations problem too.Here's go the problem: I've installed ubuntu 7.10 it works and all now i try to install windows xp to make dual boot, when i insert cd and press any key to boot it writes system is expecting your hardware and then nothing happens if anyone has a clue what is problems ?
did you create a partition for your XP install? Usually I install windows first, then linux to overwrite the windows boot loader.
I don't really know enough about the XP install process.
I would up installing it in virtualbox
